statements: UPDATE neural_network_weights_biases SET weight_matrix = '{0.1, 0.2, 0.3}', bias_vector = '{0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_weights_biases SET bias_vector = '{0.5}', weight_matrix = '{0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_weights_biases SET weight_matrix = '{0.1, 0.2, 0.3}', bias_vector = '{0.05}' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_weights_biases SET bias_vector = '{0.1, 0.2}', weight_matrix = '{0.2, 0.3, 0.4}' WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer';
UPDATE weights_and_biases SET weight = 0.5, bias = -0.2 WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE model_layers SET activation_function = 'ReLU' WHERE layer_id = 2;
UPDATE weights_and_biases SET weight = 0.75, bias = -0.5 WHERE layer_id = 3;
UPDATE model_layers SET activation_function = 'relu', layer_name = 'hidden_layer_1' WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '{"w1": 0.5, "w2": 0.3}' WHERE layer_name = 'input_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.001 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight_matrix = '{"a": 0.5, "b": 0.8}' WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
UPDATE neural_network_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.001 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight = 0.5 WHERE layer_id = 1 AND node_id = 1;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.001 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE neural_network_weights SET weight = 0.5, bias = -0.2 WHERE layer_id = 1 AND node_id = 5;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.01 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE Weights SET weight = 0.5 WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE Biases SET bias = -0.2 WHERE layer_id = 2;
UPDATE Weights SET weight = 0.75 WHERE layer_id = 1;
UPDATE Biases SET bias = -0.5 WHERE layer_id = 3;
